synergynet3.behaviours.networkflick

Class NetworkFlickBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • synergynet3.behaviours.networkflick.NetworkFlickBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBehaviour, IMultiTouchEventListener

    public class NetworkFlickBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBehaviour, IMultiTouchEventListener
    Behaviour for items which are intended to be capable of being flicked across the network. Note that with this behaviour an item does not need inertiaBehaviour, inertia is supplied by this class.
